channel.title: Client Closing Automatically
channel.description:
I know there has been a post titled the same exact thing, but I didn't find it helpful as I don't have windows 7, and I'm not running a 64bit version of windows. Also, I don't get an error, I open it, the music starts, then it just closes, with no indication as to why. Also, when I try to load it on the site, and I just get a black(sometimes white) screen. I know those two are connected, but I have no idea why it's happening. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Whitechapel
Edit: Thanks for moving, I wasn't sure where to put this honestly.
Edit: I went into the client folder and found out supposedly why it wasn't working [img]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/9877/clientfail.jpg[/img]
So I went and downloaded the cache.zip file directly, and I replaced all the files in the .mpr_file_store_32 file... ran it again, and it didn't change anything. It still crashed at exactly the same spot.

whitechapel1:

I’m not using windows 7 though… I am using vista, and if it applies to that as well, then sure I’ll give it a shot.

Yes , in that program there is for Vista too…

tick the “Add Vista administrator mainfest”

item.title: Client Closing Automatically
item.dc:creator: @CarScape CarScape
item.description:
@CarScape wrote:

You need to convert the run.bat to run.exe because you’re using windows 7 , i will search for it and post it here brb

Edit:
Fix : Download and convert ur Run.bat to Run.exe
If you don’t want your batch files showing then right click it and click edit and add at the very bottom @exit
Bat2EXE converter - http://uppit.com/v/POX9TIJ8

Good luck

Read full topic
